# borderStyle

**Instance Property**

The border style for the text field.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var borderStyle: UITextField.BorderStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/BorderStyle-swift.enum/none]. If the value is set to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/BorderStyle-swift.enum/roundedRect] style, the custom background image associated with the text field is ignored.

## Setting the view’s background appearance

- **background**: The image that represents the background appearance of the text field when it is in an enabled state.
- **disabledBackground**: The image that represents the background appearance of the text field when it is in a disabled state.
